data.title: The Dance Scene
data.meta_description: Get a glimpse inside the highly-competitive and drama-filled world of professional dance as this new docu-soap follows the lives of mega-choreographerâ¦
data.text:
EPISODE 1

I Am Full Out

Celebrity choreographer Laurieann Gibson holds auditions to find dancers for her upcoming gig for "VH1 Divas Salute the Troops," which includes choreographing numbers for Katy Perry, Keri Hilson and a number of other hot music stars. The competition is fierce and only the most dedicated dancers will be able to survive Laurieann's strict teaching style--but when one girl doesn't make the cut, Laurieann instead offers her a shot at joining her esteemed team. Plus, Laurieann reveals a secret that involves the managing partner of her dance troupe at Boom Kack Studio.

21 min Â· Apr 10, 2011 TV-PG

EPISODE 2

I'm Gonna Go Brooklyn On That Pixie Stick

After paying her dues for the past two years, Laurieann gives her assistant Lacee a chance to finally dance as part of the BoomKack team at the Beverly Hills Fashion Festival. But Lacee's big break may not happen when Laurieann threatens to pull the plug on their routine after she clashes with the show's director. Meanwhile, after her breakup with Paul, Sarah moves in with Paula and Kherington.

21 min Â· Apr 17, 2011 TV-PG

EPISODE 3

We Can Rule the World With Our Feet

Laurieann must defend her directorial debut of Keri Hilson's music video for "The Way You Love Me" when it gets slammed by critics for being too provocative. She takes to the media to set the record straight--but has the damage already been done to her and Keri's careers? Also, Kherington struggles to rekindle her passion to dance, and Sarah heads back to New York to choreograph for the Knicks City Dancers and reconnects with an old flame.

21 min Â· Apr 24, 2011 TV-PG

EPISODE 4

Mama Cub to Mama Cub

For the past year, Laurieann has been working to launch her youngest new artists Destinee and Paris, but she hits major road bumps when their overbearing mom-turned-manager keeps intervening. With the girls' showcase only days away, Laurieann believes the girls are ready to go public--but their perfection-driven "momager" threatens to pull the plug minutes before their debut performance. Meanwhile, Kherington wants to audition for Kesha's new music video but questions herself after Laurieann doesn't agree with her decision.

21 min Â· May 1, 2011 TV-PG

EPISODE 5

Nothing Like a Hot Boy From London

Laurieann transforms a British street performing crew into a pop music group and preps them for their very first music video, but she gets upset when she realizes she's dealing with an inexperienced director on the video shoot. She also notices that one of the band mates is single and would make a good match for Kherington. Although he's a bit younger, Kherington finds herself intrigued by this British dancer. Will sparks fly between them? Plus, Sarah plans to attend the "Burlesque" movie premiere but is worried about bumping into her ex Paul.

21 min Â· May 8, 2011 TV-PG

EPISODE 6

You Passed On Gaga

Laurieann works on a new artist showcase for a talented-yet-unsigned singer, Missy Modell. Determined to help her land a record deal, Laurieann is relying on her team of dancers to put on the perfect show--but when Sarah gets partnered with her ex Paul for the performance, emotions fly high and she quickly loses focus. Can Sarah pull herself together before she gets pulled from the number? Meanwhile, Kherington dances in a show for the first time since becoming Laurieann's assistant choreographer, and Paula goes on her first blind date.

21 min Â· May 15, 2011 TV-PG
